meanings.definition: A Middle Eastern dish consisting of meat (usually lamb or chicken) cooked on a vertical rotisserie and served in a pita or wrap.
meanings.sent1: I ordered two shawarmas for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The food truck sells delicious shawarmas.
meanings.sent3: The shawarmas were so tasty that they danced in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling shawarmas filled the street.
meanings.sent5: The shawarmas were a flavorful explosion in my mouth.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing or eating shawarmas.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy the shawarmas more than the cooking process.
meanings.sent2: The shawarmas were gone in minutes after we started eating.
meanings.sent3: The shawarmas decided to cook themselves today, giving me a break.
meanings.sent4: The anticipation of devouring the shawarmas was almost unbearable.
meanings.sent5: The shawarmas disappeared from the plate as if by magic.
